item.title: 48 Hours in Bacharach
item.description: Bacharach sits on a sharp bend of the Rhine, framed by vineyards and medieval towers. The town feels frozen in time, with half-timbered houses, a ruined castle, and cobbled streets that look unchanged for centuries. Two days here give you river views, wine, and a slower rhythm.
